# ProductTank SF - LLM Reference

## Overview
ProductTank SF is a monthly product management meetup. This folder contains tools and design docs for event operations.

## Linear Integration

### Key URLs
- **Workspace:** https://linear.app/product-tank-sf
- **Event Template (PRO-60):** https://linear.app/product-tank-sf/issue/PRO-60/yyyy-month-speaker-name
- **Team ID:** Product Tank SF

### Template Structure
PRO-60 is the master event template with sub-issues organized by phase:
- **Phase 1 (1.x):** Planning & Securing (Speaker, Venue, F&B, Videographer)
- **Phase 2 (2.x):** Content Development (Speaker outline, slides)
- **Phase 3 (3.x):** Pre-Event Execution (Marketing, logistics, final prep)
- **Phase 4 (4.x):** Event Day
- **Phase 5 (5.x):** Post-Event Follow-up

### Template Sub-Issues (as of 2026-01-27)
Fetch current list via: `Linear:list_issues` with `parentId` of PRO-60's UUID

### Active Event Projects
Fetch via: `Linear:list_projects` filtered by team "Product Tank SF"

## Issue Naming Convention
Template issues: `[Event Name] (i.e. Jan 2026): X.X - Task Name`
Example: `[Event Name] (i.e. Jan 2026): 1.1 - Secure Speaker`

## Labels
- Event phases: `Speaker`, `Venue`, `Food & Drink`, `Videographer`, `Marketing`, `Volunteers`
- Months: `Jan`, `Feb`, `Mar`, etc.
- Other: `Event`, `Sponsors`, `Sponsor - Other`

## Other Integrations
- **Gmail:** wmfrederick+producttanksf@gmail.com
- **Google Sheets (Events Tracker):** https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GN2mAqlv_QRdCD4cuIplw_8IbwfjwpdlHTe7CSlcagY/edit
- **Speaker Form Results:** gid=206355470 in Events Tracker
